Note: Date based on the date of the Second Liberty Loan. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Design for a newspaper and magazine advertisement for the Second Liberty Loan campaign.  The text says we must back up our men with our last dollar because they are laying down their lives for freedom and humanity. Germany hates our interference with her plot against the whole world's freedom. Illustration shows a man using a war tank as his plow.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Keep the furrow going!
